name: The Climb (itch) (Grim69420)
description:
Try to keep your sanity while climbing the platforms! Enjoy the view of missing content.

Use A and D to move left and right, and hold W to charge your jump. When W is released, you will jump in a direction of your choice, possibly to your doom. Important to note that the speed and angle of your jump depends on how long W is held.

Exit the game by pressing the escape key or clicking the usual X in the top right.

Turn the game fullscreen if you'd like by any of the usual means, such as ALT+Enter or clicking the maximize button.

Most of the content, as well as secondary puzzle mechanics were cut from this build due to too much procrastination to turn them into something meaningful. Will possibly be updated. Full source code will be released in the coming days.
